channel.title: How do i?
channel.description: I got a 317 Delta server a runescape 2006 remake. but i need to know how to change: [size=12pt][u]-The teleports in the spellbook (They are messed up like monster teleports ect) I have changed the teleport name allready but i only need to change where i go when anyone click's the teleport.[/u][/size] -How to make a command that opens a webpage or something! -I need a Noclip command.

item.title: How do i?
item.dc:creator: @Ninjamovement Ninjamovement
item.description:
@Ninjamovement wrote:

[quote=“RSPS222, post:3, topic:484954”]Already expalned you all of the code.

Dont be dumb if you have a website put the URL IN THERE.
and DELETE THE COMMAND THAT CALLED RL AND THE COMMAND CALL MOPAR
REPLACE WITH THAT COMMAND :
Look at the final command
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Website”)){
String url = “//https://Google.com”;
java.awt.Desktop.getDesktop().browse(java.net.URI. create(url));
}
thats just baiscly opens up google change the url to your website GL!

still giving me a loveing error !!!

why you got the error is because you need to delete the command called “RL” And the command that called “MOPAR”

edit : use your BRAIN… if you have a monster teleport search what typed in the monster teleport on your java file (like rock crabs etc…) and DELETE IT? MAYBE??[/quote]
I’m not fucking dumb man do you think i let everything on there ?
i found a method @ the client side that works fine …

Read full topic

item.title: How do i?
item.dc:creator: @RSPS222 RSPS222
item.description:
@RSPS222 wrote:

Already expalned you all of the code.

[quote=“Ninjamovement, post:32, topic:484526”][quote author=RSPS222 link=topic=602761.msg4221690#msg4221690 date=1360793351]
Dont be dumb if you have a website put the URL IN THERE.
and DELETE THE COMMAND THAT CALLED RL AND THE COMMAND CALL MOPAR
REPLACE WITH THAT COMMAND :
Look at the final command
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Website”)){
String url = “//https://Google.com”;
java.awt.Desktop.getDesktop().browse(java.net.URI. create(url));
}
thats just baiscly opens up google change the url to your website GL!
[/quote]
still giving me a loveing error !!![/quote]
why you got the error is because you need to delete the command called “RL” And the command that called “MOPAR”

edit : use your BRAIN… if you have a monster teleport search what typed in the monster teleport on your java file (like rock crabs etc…) and DELETE IT? MAYBE??

Read full topic

item.title: How do i?
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

Copied from Rune Server - Not mine

Wow, you people are mean to a person in need of a noclip command, any wayssss. I’ll make like a mini tutorial, first open up your client class (client side) and find
Code:

public class client extends Applet_Sub1
{

then RIGHT UNDER THAT, not after the method there, exactly after the { add:
Code:

public void noclip()

{
for (int i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
{
for (int j = 1; j < 103; ++j)
{
for (int k = 1; k < 103; ++k)
this.aClass11Array1230[i].anIntArrayArray294[j][k] = 0;
}
}
}

now go down and find a command your client already has, for example mine uses, (you can also put it under “add models” command):
Code:

if(s.startsWith(“mousecoords”)) {
mousecoords = true;
}

and under that put
Code:

if(s.startsWith(“noclip”)) {
noclip();
}

and compile and run, there you go.

For the teleports, look in clickingMost.java it should have the teleport locations that you can edit.

For the opening of a website, this link should help you figure that out:

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/128994-force-website-open-player.html

Read full topic
